name: Trabi vs. Zombies: Apocalypse VR
summary:
Kill zombies with your deadly weapon - upgraded car from East Germany!
Zombie apocalypse is coming! Kill so many zombies as is possible and stay alive. You have got powerful weapon, car from East Germany - Trabant! You can play survive highway or accomplish hard, nearly impossible missions.
Upgrade your Trabi to deadly weapon. Buy more rockets, bigger fuel or powerful jet. There is also deadly Blade.
